was I look around the world so much
needs changing where do you think I
should
start and Eunice told the story of the
gramine bank but the punchline was start
with whatever is closest at hand don't
think you're going to change the world
think I'm going to help one person
that's what he did with the gramine bank
there's a it's a it's a famous story now
he's told it so well and so many times a
woman sitting in m in in her front yard
weaving furniture and yet in poverty she
obviously has skills she obviously is
working and yet she's impoverished how
can this be and when he found out more
he found out about a lone shark and
effectively the woman was a a wage slave
and he had to do something about it so
what what I wrote in rules of thumb was
Muhammad yunas didn't get up that
morning committed to winning the Nobel
Peace Prize he didn't get up that
morning even committed to starting the
gramine bank he saw a woman suffering
and he couldn't not help her and so you
know the tendency in Venture Capital
circles in America
you know uh big big powerful uh uh type
A personality circles is to say think
big start big get big or go home if you

you can do start small touch a person
fix a a specific problem if it works
